actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to express the sense of Congress that for fiscal year 1975 the Administration on Aging fund long-term and short-term training programs under title IV of the Older Americans Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that (1) for fiscal year 1975 the Administration on Aging fund long-term and short-term training programs under title IV of the Older Americans Act, and (2) the Administration on Aging give clear directives immediately on how these funds may be utilized to respond to the need for training students at higher educational institutions and for the purpose of covering the costs of courses in gerontology.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to express the sense of Congress that for fiscal year 1975 the Administration on Aging fund long-term and short-term training programs under title IV of the Older Americans Act, and for other purposes.
